title: SIC! SIC! SIC!
html:
SIC! SIC! SIC!

“I consider myself a very sophisticated human being— you know, beneath this sort of thing.” [Woman giving opening testimonial on phone to Bernard Meltzer, WOR, 16 December 1979, 11:27 a.m.]
